nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
![Callforge]({{ $env.WEBHOOK_URL }}
## CallForge - The AI Gong Sales Call Processor
CallForge allows you to extract important information for different departments from your Sales Gong Calls. 

### Transcript PreProcessor
This workflow preps the call transcripts to pass into the call processor. It starts by using the code node to separate the different speakers into either Internal or External speaker. It also pulls data from Salesforce to enrich the call data by pulling things such as company name.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
## Get Gong Transcript and Call Details
The transcript is to pass into the AI prompt, but needs to be transformed first. The Call details provide the Prompt with metadata.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Format Call Transcript 
Here we join the call transcript together and then set the speaker as either Internal (for our sales team) or External (for our customers).

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Enrich Call Data
Here we get the Pipedrive ID using the email domain and use that to search pipedrive for the customer. We also pass the domain into the People Data Labs api to get location data.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Extract Final Data Blob
Here we merge the final outputs and get rid of anything we don't need for the final AI prompt.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Executeworkflowtrigger Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Executeworkflowtrigger Workflow. This workflow integrates 10 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, salesforce, code, splitOut. It contains 27 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 27
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Execute Workflow Trigger**: executeWorkflowTrigger
- **Retrieve detailed call data**: httpRequest
- **Get transcript**: httpRequest
- **Join Transcript to String**: set
- **Isolate Notion Data**: set
- **Join Affiliation**: code
- **Join conversation**: code
- **Sticky Note5**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- ... and 17 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
